title: Gab and Juls: Tuchel and Conte See Red
description:
Julien Laurens is joined by Nedum Onuoha to discuss Tottenham's controversial draw against Chelsea in the Premier League. The guys also discuss Manchester United's 4-0 defeat against Brentford, Barcelona's misfiring start in LaLiga and ask why Lionel Messi was left off the list of Balon d'Or candidates.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Fallout from Battle at the Bridge 2; Breaking down Manchester United's brutal start to the season; Messi left off Balon d'Or list
